api-video-strapi-5-plugin.plugin.name: api.video Plugin
api-video-strapi-5-plugin.emptyState.con: You don't have any videos yet
api-video-strapi-5-plugin.setupNeeded.co: In order for uploads to function, an administrator will need to complete the setup of this plugin by visiting the settings page. Click the button below to be taken there now.

api-video-strapi-5-plugin.homePage.subti: Upload to and manage your api.video library directly within Strapi
api-video-strapi-5-plugin.importZone.sel: Select a video file to upload
api-video-strapi-5-plugin.importZone.orD: or drag and drop it here
